title: What is the most educated country in the world in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: Considering average literacy rates Canada ranks first. When it comes to people opting for higher education, Belgium ranks first. More details here. Do drop an upvote if you found this answer helpful. Check out my other QnAs on my profile below and follow the same for getting regular updates: Abhishek Deshpande Thank you.
